name: Replica: Stack!
description:
In an attempt to improve my game development skills, I remade the classic mobile game: Stack. 

This project is open-source, and can be found here: https://github.com/Samuwhale/Stack-remake

Controls:

  • Stack a block by touching/clicking the screen, or by pressing 'E'/'Space' (keyboard) or 'A' (Gamepad)
